name: button formater
format:
<style>
    .nr-dashboard-group {
        display: flex;
        justify-content: center;
        width: auto;
    }

    /* Increase the font size of the button text */
    .nr-dashboard-button .md-button {
        font-size: 20px;
        /* Adjust the size as needed */
    }
</style>

name: Big button template
format:
<style>
    /* Increase the font size of the button text */
    .nr-dashboard-button[node-class="big_button"] .md-button {
    font-size: 30px;
    /* Adjust the size as needed */
    white-space: pre-line; /* Allows line breaks */
    text-align: center; /* Center-align text */
    }
</style>
